name: It's just the wind outside
description: The title of this short story was inspired on one of Renato Russo's song, a Brazilian musician who already died, if you want to listen to it in Portuguese it's called "Pais e Filhos". This short story it's a lot about depression, love, small cities and crappy jobs. I live in a small city, and people sometimes really go crazy... But this is only the first part of this short story, so stay tuned for part 2!
